description:
My place is close to Brooklyn Standard, Peter Pan Donut & Pastry Shop, G and L train. Located in serene and beautiful Greenpoint with trendy eateries, vintage shops, lively bars and parks nearby. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

-Walking distance to McCarren Park and Williamsburg
-Conveniently close to the G and L subway stations. 
Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Gorgeous Brooklyn Loft 2 bed
